verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* came to all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. Now \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* beside \w Eben-ezer|strong="H0072"\w*: and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Aphek|strong="H0663"\w*.\f + \fr 4.1 \ft came: or, came to pass: Heb. was\f*

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* put themselves in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and when they \w joined|strong="H5203"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and they \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w army|strong="H4634"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* about \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 4.2 \ft they joined…: Heb. the battle was spread\f*\f + \fr 4.2 \ft army: Heb. array\f*

¶ And when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* us to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*? Let us \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* out of \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* unto us, that, when it \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us, it may \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.  +  r 4.3  t fetch: Heb. take unto us *

So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, that they might \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* from thence the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, which \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \add between\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*: and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* and \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \add were\add* there with the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And when the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*, so that the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* rang \w again|strong="H1949"\w*.

And when the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add meaneth\add* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*? And they \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* were \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*. And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto us! for there hath not been such a thing \w heretofore|strong="H0865"\w*.\f + \fr 4.7 \ft heretofore: Heb. yesterday, or, the third day\f*

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto us! who shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of these \w mighty|strong="H0117"\w* \w Gods|strong="H0430"\w*? these \add are\add* the \w Gods|strong="H0430"\w* that \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* with all the \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and \w quit|strong="H1961"\w* yourselves like \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, O ye \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, that ye be not \w servants|strong="H5647"\w* unto the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, as they have \w been|strong="H5647"\w* to you: \w quit|strong="H1961"\w* yourselves like \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft quit…: Heb. be men\f*

¶ And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w*, and they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* into his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*: and there was a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*; for there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w footmen|strong="H7273"\w*.

And the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*; and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* and \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, were \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 4.11 \ft were slain: Heb. died\f*

¶ And there \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* out of the \w army|strong="H4634"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* with his \w clothes|strong="H4055"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and with \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, lo, \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* upon a \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* by the \w wayside|strong="H1870"\w* \w watching|strong="H6822"\w*: for his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2730"\w* for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add*, all the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* cried \w out|strong="H2199"\w*.

And when \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w crying|strong="H6818"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add meaneth\add* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of this \w tumult|strong="H1995"\w*? And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* in \w hastily|strong="H4116"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*.

Now \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* was \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*; and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* were \w dim|strong="H6965"\w*, that he \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.\f + \fr 4.15 \ft were dim: Heb. stood\f*

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, I \add am\add* he that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* out of the \w army|strong="H4634"\w*, and I \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* out of the \w army|strong="H4634"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What is there \w done|strong="H1697"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?\f + \fr 4.16 \ft is…: Heb. is the thing\f*

And the \w messenger|strong="H1319"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and there hath been also a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4046"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and thy \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* and \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, are \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*.

And it came to pass, when he made \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* from off the \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* \w backward|strong="H0322"\w* \w by|strong="H1157"\w* the \w side|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and his \w neck|strong="H4665"\w* \w brake|strong="H7665"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: for he was an \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*. And he had \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ And his daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w Phinehas’|strong="H6372"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, was with \w child|strong="H2030"\w*, \add near\add* to be \w delivered|strong="H3205"\w*: and when she \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w* \w that|strong="H0413"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*, and that her father in \w law|strong="H2524"\w* and her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* were \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, she \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* herself and \w travailed|strong="H3205"\w*; for her \w pains|strong="H6735"\w* \w came|strong="H2015"\w* upon her.\f + \fr 4.19 \ft be delivered: or, cry out\f*\f + \fr 4.19 \ft came: Heb. were turned\f*

And about the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of her \w death|strong="H4191"\w* the women that \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* by her \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto her, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not; for thou hast \w born|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. But she \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* not, neither did she \w regard|strong="H7896"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 4.20 \ft neither…: Heb. set not her heart\f*

And she \w named|strong="H7121"\w* the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w I-chabod|strong="H0350"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* is \w departed|strong="H1540"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w because|strong="H0413"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*, and because of her father in \w law|strong="H2524"\w* and her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 4.21 \ft I-chabod: that is, Where is the glory? or, There is no glory\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* is \w departed|strong="H1540"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*.
